participant_1.background: my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young.

participant_2.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
